Header: 5 judge bench to consider the petition against the death penalty for drug convicts
Content: A 5 judge bench has been appointed by the court of appeal to consider the petition against implementing death penalty for drug convicts. Accordingly, this petition that seeks an interim order on the presidentâ€™s decision will be taken before Court of Appeal chairman, Yasantha Kodagoda, Justices Deepali Wijesundera, Janak de Silva, Achala Wengappuli and Arjuna Obeysekera today. Journalist, Malinda Senevirathna filed the petition on June 28 th . The Attorney General, the superintendent of Welikada prison and the Prison Commissioner have been named as respondents. In addition to this petition, another 10 such petitions have already been filed in the Supreme Court.
